author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...SONIA CONTINUES STRENGTHENING AS IT MOVES WESTWARD FAR FROM LAND...
summary: ...SONIA CONTINUES STRENGTHENING AS IT MOVES WESTWARD FAR FROM LAND... As of 8:00 AM PDT Sat Oct 25 the center of Sonia was located near 13.5, -118.1 with movement W at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...SONIA CONTINUES STRENGTHENING AS IT MOVES WESTWARD FAR FROM LAND... As of 8:00 AM PDT Sat Oct 25 the center of Sonia was located near 13.5, -118.1 with movement W at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Sonia (EP3/EP182025)
